dct_title_s: Map of Near and Middle East oil [cartographic material].
dct_description_sm: At head of title: Sixth edition of the B. Orchard Lisle (fomerly The Oil Forum) Map has a circular frame surrounded by multiple inset maps in different scales, covering a country or a geographical place, from Libya at the west eastward to India-Pakistan-Afghanistan, from Turkey at the north southward to Horn of Africa and Gulf of Aden. "Map must not be considered an authority on delimitation of international boundaries." Shows principal oil companies operations and concession boundaries, location of drilling and exploration operations, prospecting oilfields, producing oilfields, refineries, pipelines, tanker routes, and railways. Depths shown by bathymetric tints. Includes key to smaller concession holdings, 2 statistical tables on refinery capacity, and estimates of proven reserves.
dct_publisher_sm: Fort Worth, Texas : B. Orchard Lisle Industrial Cartography, [1960]
